abstract: HSBC Holdings said Sunday that it had raised nearly $18 billion by issuing new shares to investors, one of the largest such offerings in British history, The New York Times’s David Jolly reported.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings said Sunday that it had raised nearly $18 billion by issuing new shares to investors, one of the largest such offerings in British history, The New York Times’s David Jolly reported.

headline.main: HSBC Raises $17.7 Billion in Stock Sale
